Ok. hi! my name is Alex.
I am trying to make a game similiar to Final Fanstasy except the story line and the characters. I mean like I want an rpg etc.


I was wondering how to make characters fight and stuff.
And how to make people join.
And how to get my game set up and everything.

So I am wondering. If someone really good with this program has time.
Please contact me on aim
Aim:DusckSk

Thanks lol. And sorry If I ask some stupid questions.
